reactor.bus.spec

Class EventRoutingComponentSpec<SPEC extends EventRoutingComponentSpec<SPEC,TARGET>,TARGET>

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.bus.spec.DispatcherComponentSpec<SPEC,TARGET>
      • reactor.bus.spec.EventRoutingComponentSpec<SPEC,TARGET>
  • Type Parameters:
    SPEC - The DispatcherComponentSpec subclass
    TARGET - The type that this spec will create
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Supplier<TARGET>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EventBusSpec, NetServerSpec, TcpClientSpec

    public abstract class EventRoutingComponentSpec<SPEC extends EventRoutingComponentSpec<SPEC,TARGET>,TARGET>
extends DispatcherComponentSpec<SPEC,TARGET>
    A generic environment-aware class for specifying components that need to be configured with an Environment, Dispatcher, and Router.
    Author:
    Jon Brisbin

      • consumerRegistry

        public SPEC consumerRegistry(Registry<Consumer<? extends Event<?>>> consumerRegistry)
        Configures the Registry to use when creating this component. Registries can be shared to reduce GC pressure and potentially be persisted across restarts.
        Parameters:
        consumerRegistry - the consumer registry to use
        Returns:
